channel.title: 639 help
channel.description:
Well, simply.

item.title: 639 help

Fridder:

He wants to know how to read the .bin files, not how to make himself an administrator.

but majority of times that people try to edit their characters and end up getting a bin file, So I automatically thought that was what the guy was after :o

item.title: 639 help
item.dc:creator: @destruction-pkz destruction-pkz
item.description:
@destruction-pkz wrote:

Iâ€™ll take it that you are trying to get admin on your character so follow my tut :),

[code]public static final String[] ADMINS = {""};//ad names here for admins

public static final String[] MODERATORS = {""}; //add names here for mods[/code]

Add this to the top of your actionsender.java

now to do the next part search for this:

then under that^ add this:

for (String admin : ADMINS) if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(admin)) player.getDefinition().setRights(2); for (String mod : MODERATORS) if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(mod)) player.getDefinition().setRights(1);

now you should be admin or mod or both XD.

Read full topic
